original_text:
The earth takes shape like clay under a seal;
    its features stand out like those of a garment.
korean_text: 땅이 변하여 진흙에 인친 것 같이 되었고 그들은 옷 같이 나타나되

sentences.original_text: The earth takes shape like clay under a seal
sentences.korean_translation: 땅은 인장 아래 점토처럼 모양을 갖추고

sentences.original_text: its features stand out like those of a garment
